message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that is valued at $1200000, providing you with a significant saving and a chance to own something truly remarkable. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
